Package staff.unipr.it

Class StaffService

java.lang.Object
staff.unipr.it.StaffService
public class StaffService extends Object
The StaffService class contains all request that a staff member could do to the server. It is used to send to the server request objects. Its methods receive all data which must be send to the server from different form that a staff member complete.
Author:
Spagni Alex Zuelli Arianna

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffService

      public StaffService()
      Class constructor

  • Method Details

    • signUp

      public int signUp(String username, String password, int reqvalue)
      This function is used from the StaffSignInController to SignIn a user. All the information that a staff member enter into the form will be sent to the server into a request object. Request object that is used is RequestStaffSignUp.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username entered by the user.
      password - is the passeword entered by the user.
      reqvalue - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

    • getPayments

      public ArrayList<javaClass.FeePayment> getPayments(int idmember, int typeReq)
      This function is used from the StaffSeeMembershipPayment,StaffSeeRacePayment and staffSeeStoragePayment in order to get get access to all payment made by users with credit card or by bonifico.This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffPayments.
      Parameters:
      idmember - id that identify univocally a member
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      Returns:
      it returns an array list of FeePayment object.

    • getUserMustPayFee

      public ArrayList<javaClass.Notification> getUserMustPayFee(int typeReq)
      This function is used from the StaffAddMembershipFeeController,StaffAddStorageFeeController,StaffSendMembershipNotification and StaffSendStorageNotification in order to get get access to all Membership/Storage fee that hasn't stored in the database yet. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffAddPayments.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      Returns:
      it returns an array list of Notification object.

    • addUserMustPayMembershipFee

      public int addUserMustPayMembershipFee(int typeReq, int idmember, Date data, int price, String paied)
      This function is used from the StaffAddMembershipFeeController to add a new membership fee to the database, so a member will pay it. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffAddPayments.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idmember - id that identify univocally a member.
      data - local date.
      price - price of the fee.
      paied - string that say if a fee has been paied or not.
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

    • addUserMustPayStorageFee

      public int addUserMustPayStorageFee(int typeReq, int idmember, Date data, int price, String paied, int idBoat)
      This function is used from the StaffAddStorageFeeController to add a new storage fee to the database, so a member will pay it. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffAddPayments.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idmember - id that identify univocally a member.
      data - local date.
      price - price of the fee.
      paied - string that say if a fee has been paied or not.
      idBoat - id of the boat on which a member must pay a fee
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

    • manageMemberCredential

      public int manageMemberCredential(int typeReq, int idMember, String fiscalCode, String address)
      This function is used from the StaffModifymemberCredential to modify some credential of a user. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffManagemember.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idMember - id that identify univocally a Member.
      fiscalCode - new fiscal code of the user selected.
      address - new address of the user selected.
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

      public int removeAMember(int typeReq, int idMember)

      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idMember - id that identify univocally a Member.
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

      public ArrayList<Member> getMembers(int typeReq)

      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      Returns:
      It returns an array list of member objects.

    • getBoat

      public ArrayList<javaClass.Boat> getBoat(int typeReq)
      This function is used from the StaffModifyBoatDatal to get access to all boat stored into the database. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffManageBoat.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      Returns:
      It returns an array list of boat objects.

    • modifyBoatData

      public int modifyBoatData(int typeReq, int idBoat, String storage, int length)
      This function is used from the StaffModifyBoatData to modify boat lenght and boat "state". This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffManageBoat.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idBoat - id that identify univocally a boat.
      storage - string that say if a boat is into a state of storage or not.
      length - new length of the boat.
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

    • addARace

      public int addARace(int typeReq, String raceName, Date raceDate, int price, String racePlace)
      This function is used from the staffAddARace to add a new race. Race information will be stored on the database. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffRace.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      raceName - name of the race that has been added
      raceDate - when the race will take place
      price - price to join the race
      racePlace - where the race will take place
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

    • getRace

      public ArrayList<javaClass.Race> getRace(int typeReq)
      This function is used from the StaffModifyRaceController, StaffSeeAllRaceController and StaffSimulateARaceControllerto get access to all race stored into the database. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffRace.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      Returns:
      it return an array list of Race objects.

    • modifyARace

      public int modifyARace(int typeReq, int idGara, String place, Date date)
      This function is used from the StaffModifyRaceController to modify where and when a race will take place. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffManageBoat.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idGara - id that identifies univocally a race.
      place - new place where a race will take place.
      date - new date when a race will take place.
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

    • simulateARace

      public int simulateARace(int typeReq, int idGara, String racePlace, String raceName)
      This function is used from the StaffSimulateARaceController to simulate a race. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffManageBoat.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idGara - id that identifies univocally a race.
      racePlace - place where a race will take place.
      raceName - name of the race
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

    • sendMembershipFeeNotification

      public int sendMembershipFeeNotification(int typeReq, int idMember, Date data, int price, String paied)
      This function is used from the StaffSendMembershipNotification to send a notification to a user to remember him to pay the fee This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffFeeNotification.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
      idMember - id that identify univocally a Member.
      data - local date of the fee user must pay.
      price - price of the fee user must pay.
      paied - string that say if a fee has been paied or not.
      Returns:
      It returns an integer value that is the answer send by the server.

      public int sendStorageFeeNotification(int typeReq, int idMember, Date data, int price, String paied, int idBoat)
      This function is used from the StaffSendMembershipNotification to send a notification to a user to remember him to pay the fee. This kind of request is sent to the server with a request object. The request object that is used is RequestStaffFeeNotification.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - this param is used to distinguish which request client is making to the server.
